description: Results of parking space occupancy and details

occupied.description: Indicates if the parking space is occupied

parking_dwell_time.description: Dwell time in minutes for the parked vehicle

double_parking_status.description: Indicates if the vehicle is double parked

double_parking_dwell_time.description: Dwell time in minutes for the double parked vehicle

double_parking_location.description: Array of coordinates for the double parked vehicle location

vehicle_blocked_lane_types.description: Type of lane blocked by the vehicle, if applicable
